ModMetaData.name: GeneticRim Dinosauria Patch
ModMetaData.author: Sarg
ModMetaData.description:
Extract DNA from animals and hybridize them to create new, exotic species!
<size=24>Features</size> - Adds eight hybrids between vanilla creatures and dinosaurs from the Dinosauria mod! - Adds a new machine, the Archeo-genepod, to mix genes from dinosaurs and create your hybrids.
<size=24>Load Order</size> - As with all patch mods, be sure to call it after Dinosauria mod and GeneticRim mod, or else you'll get some errors.
<size=24>Compatibility</size> Made compatible with A Dog Said using Modcheck Should be savegame compatible and not break anything. Should!
<size=24>Credit</size> Credit goes to Spincrus for all his awesome work on Rimworld.
<size=24>Changelog</size> v1.0: Release (2/1/18)
